results.content:
Heavy accent and don't do explanation clear enough. The video does not records every steps he did and you can just hear what he said and try to do it on your side. Also, projects are not so "powerful", they are more like projects for beginners. 
The only other 3 reviews are all posted 3 weeks ago and all leaving 5 stars, just so suspicious.
